sections.title: Step-by-step process
paragraphs: We evaluate your goals, visa options, and constraints.
We choose the most reliable visa route and alternatives.
We compile, translate, and legalize required documents.
We guide your submission and appointment process.
We align entry timelines with legal requirements.
We prepare you for in-country registration.
We help with CPF, banking, housing, and healthcare.
We handle renewals and status updates.

sections.title: Timeline guidance
paragraphs: Timelines vary by visa type, documentation readiness, and appointment availability. We provide a realistic schedule during your assessment.

sections.title: Start your immigration plan
paragraphs: We will help you choose the right visa path, prepare your documents, and build a realistic timeline.
